page.title: 11W.CHILTINGTON CLUBS
page.content: In the village there are 3 clubs for children;{Brownies}for girls aged 7 - 10;{Football Club}for boys over 7 and a{Youth Club.}There is also a{Sunday {School}and a{Cygnets}group at{St.Marys {Church. { Brownies}are part of the{Girl Guides movement. Each pack is grouped in sixes.They learn different crafts and skills;eg.art,homecraft,games & music. At{Youth Club}they play games on Saturdays and have a Hobbies night on Wednesday. They have a model railway and a course for BMX bike riding. There is a flower arranging group in the village.They organise a display at the{Village Show.} The church organises several groups and there are other activities eg.popmobility and{Womens' Institute. 2{PLaygroups}are run by the mums.
